designSystemProfile.name: TeamUp Pitch Deck
designSystemProfile.description: A design system profile based on the TeamUp pitch deck for consistent, AI-driven design replication.

style.overall: Modern, clean, and professional with a friendly and approachable feel. The design uses a mix of photographic elements, illustrative icons, and clean typography to create a sense of trust and collaboration.

layout.grid: A flexible grid system is used to align elements and create a sense of order. The layout is typically single-column, with a clear visual hierarchy.
layout.spacing: Generous use of white space to improve readability and focus. Consistent margins and padding are used throughout the document.
layout.alignment: Left-aligned text is standard for body copy, while headings are often centered for emphasis.

buttons.style: Subtle, with a solid color fill and rounded corners. No strong shadows or gradients.
buttons.text: Uppercase, bold, and centered within the button.

lists.style: Bulleted or numbered lists are used to break up text and improve scannability.
lists.iconography: Simple, line-based icons are used to add visual interest and clarify meaning.

images.style: High-quality, professional photographs of people are used to create a human connection. Images are often cropped into circles or other shapes to add visual interest.
images.treatment: Images are used as background elements or as standalone visuals. They are often overlaid with text or other design elements.

replicationGuidelines.toneAndVoice: The tone should be professional yet approachable, inspiring confidence and trust.
dos: Use the defined color palette consistently.
Ensure generous use of white space.
donts: Do not use overly decorative fonts.
Do not use low-quality or pixelated images.
